TopicTitle: Did 1.0.5 remove the large fixed solar panel?

Articles.Content:
I've been playing around in 1.0.5 and while building a rover I noticed that I couldn't find the large fixed solar panel. After checking several times and filtering the part list different ways I still couldn't find it. I can't find mention of this in the hotfix or original release changelog. Anyone know what happened to this part? I used it in several of my base builds. :/

I should mention I'm playing all stock 1.0.5 before the hotfix.

Edited November 12, 2015 by Wolfos31
That was a mod part, from the official asteroid day mod, you can download a 1.0.5 version here: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/232196-asteroid-day
Ah thank you! It all makes sense now. I really wish that "mod" would be included in stock already, I can't think of a reason everyone wouldn't want it.

I really wish that "mod" would be included in stock already, I can't think of a reason everyone wouldn't want it.

I agree

I agree

I don't want the Sentinel Infrared Telescope and related asteroid finding functionality. But I do love the other parts it comes with!!

I agree

I'm hoping it gets rolled into 1.1.
Did they fix the Asteroid Day bug where it makes all tourist/rescue contracts exclusively female kerbals?

Did they fix the Asteroid Day bug where it makes all tourist/rescue contracts exclusively female kerbals?

So far, all my rescued Kerbales have been female, but since that's only been a handful that might have been a coincidence. I didn't think it would have to wait until 1.1 to get fixed, but it appears it does.
I've been editing the save file to get some gender variety. Though in 1.0.4, mine were exclusively male...

1. It's not an asteroid day bug. It's a bug in KSP's contract system.

2. It was fixed a month ago, and that fix is in 1.0.5 too.
